title: Ben Curry is flying out to Japan to watch twin brother Tom in World Cup final
text:
Ben Curry, the Sale Sharks flanker, is set to fly to Japan to watch his twin brother Tom play for England in this weekend's Rugby World Cup final, after the Gallagher Premiership club gave the flanker permission to travel to Yokohama.

Tom Curry was one of England's standout players in their impressive semi-final win over New Zealand in Yokohama, on the same day as his twin brother, Ben, was involved off the bench for Sale in their big 41-7 victory over London Irish at the Madejski Stadium.

Sale tweeted out on Monday - "200 retweets and we’ll send @BenCurry98 to Japan. #GetBenToJapan" That target was quickly met, with Sale later tweeting: “Looks like @BenCurry98 is going to Japan!”

Ben, the older...
description: Ben Curry, the Sale Sharks flanker, is set to fly to Japan to watch his twin brother Tom play for England in this weekend's Rugby World Cup final, after the Gallagher Premiership club gave the flanker permission to travel to Yokohama.
